Title: Joyjatra
Writer: Amjad Hossain (novel), Tauquir Ahmed (dialogue), Tauquir Ahmed (screenplay)
Actors: Bipasha Hayat, Azizul Hakim, Mahfuz Ahmed, Abul Hayat
Plot: It's a story of boat journey of Bangladesh in 1971 of helpless people was going towards the safe border.Pakistan military had unleashed genocide in the country. Heroic sons of the soil started a war of liberation.
